title: ALPN
summary: Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation (ALPN) is a TLS extension (defined in RFC 7301) for identifying what application-layer protocol is negotiating the encrypted connection, without requiring additional round trips to do so.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
